name: Lathe
Lore: 'Was one of Jabba''s vile Nikto henchmen. Leaving Tatooine to see what the galaxy has to offer. Deep down, he loathes the slave trade. Information broker.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. If opponent has 2 or more aliens of the same title at this site, may place Lathe in Lost Pile to cause all of them to be lost. Once per turn, may use 1 Force to shuffle opponent''s Reserve Deck.',
